root.name: GET()
root.description: The GET method is used to fetch data from a web server. It is the method used by web browsers most commonly used to fetch the contents of a URL. It can also be used to execute scripts that return data based on parameters passed in the URL string.

parameter.label: file
parameter.description: String: name of file to fetch or script to execute on the web server

parameter.label: params
parameter.description: String[]: an array of String objects representing the names of parameters being passed to a script

parameter.label: values
parameter.description: String[]: an array of String objects representing the values of parameters being passed to a script
